LEAD_ID.description: The unique ID of the lead

SALUTATION.description: The salutation or title of the lead

FIRST_NAME.description: The first name of the lead

LAST_NAME.description: The last name of the lead

LEAD_SOURCE_ID.description: The ID of the lead source

LEAD_STATUS_ID.description: The ID of the lead status

CONVERTED.description: Indicates if the lead has been converted

CONVERTED_CONTACT_ID.description: The ID of the contact associated with the converted lead

CONVERTED_DATE_UTC.description: The date and time of lead conversion in UTC

CONVERTED_OPPORTUNITY_ID.description: The ID of the opportunity associated with the converted lead

CONVERTED_ORGANISATION_ID.description: The ID of the organization associated with the converted lead

DATE_CREATED_UTC.description: The date and time when the lead was created in UTC

DATE_UPDATED_UTC.description: The date and time when the lead was last updated in UTC

EMAIL.description: The email address of the lead

EMPLOYEE_COUNT.description: The number of employees in the lead's organization

FAX.description: The fax number of the lead

INDUSTRY.description: The industry of the lead's organization

LEAD_RATING.description: The rating assigned to the lead

MOBILE.description: The mobile number of the lead

OWNER_USER_ID.description: The ID of the user who owns the lead

PHONE.description: The phone number of the lead

RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID.description: The ID of the user responsible for the lead

WEBSITE.description: The website URL of the lead's organization

ADDRESS_STREET.description: The street address of the lead

ADDRESS_CITY.description: The city of the lead's address

ADDRESS_STATE.description: The state of the lead's address

ADDRESS_POSTCODE.description: The postal code of the lead's address

ADDRESS_COUNTRY.description: The country of the lead's address

LAST_ACTIVITY_DATE_UTC.description: The date and time of the lead's last activity in UTC

NEXT_ACTIVITY_DATE_UTC.description: The date and time of the lead's next activity in UTC

ORGANISATION_NAME.description: The name of the lead's organization

CREATED_USER_ID.description: The ID of the user who created the lead

IMAGE_URL.description: The URL of the lead's image

EMAIL_OPTED_OUT.description: Indicates if the lead has opted out of email communications

CUSTOMFIELDS.description: Custom fields associated with the lead

FIELD_NAME.description: The name of the custom field

FIELD_VALUE.description: The value of the custom field

OBJECT_NAME.description: The name of the linked object

OBJECT_ID.description: The ID of the linked object

LINK_OBJECT_NAME.description: The name of the object linked to

LINK_OBJECT_ID.description: The ID of the object linked to

IS_FORWARD.description: Indicates if the link is forward
